Server
Interface ChatServer

All Superinterfaces:
java.rmi.Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
ChatServerImpl
public interface ChatServer
extends java.rmi.Remote

Das Interface für einen Chatserver

Author:
Klassen,Kokoschka,Langer,Meurer

                          ClientHandle handle)
                          throws java.rmi.RemoteException
